attributes.action: force all road designers to cycle on the cycle lanes they plan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cycle lanes, supposedly an aid to increasing the number of cyclists on the road, are currently incredably poorly designed. Currently they give more priority to car drivers than cyclists and actually make cycling more dangerous than if they weren't there at all.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "force all road designers to cycle on the cycle lanes they plan."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page10784.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Cycle-lanes/
